page.title: 03BADER PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: Bader Primary School is built on the old runway of the previous Thornaby airfield,a Battle of Britain station. It serves a catchment area of private and council homes within the new part of Thornaby.Our school and its close environs have strong connections with the 2nd world war.Our school and its name,Bader,honours a famous fighter pilot;our nearest neighbour,Tedder School, honours another distinguished war leader.Even the near wharehousing has adapted redundant hangers.Our school is now a primary establishment with a nursery unit.Until 2 years ago the base supported 2 separate schools, an infant and junior but the economic climate dictated that they amalgamate. Our school,at present,has a workforce of 52 people serving 480 children.The building is an open_plan purpose built structure with a separate admin block.
